solution_line_template: Deduct the amount saved from the total cost of the set. ${set_cost} - ${gabby_has} = $<<{set_cost}-{gabby_has}={remaining_after_savings}>>{remaining_after_savings}
Deduct the amount of money Gabby received from her mom. ${remaining_after_savings} - ${mom_gave} = $<<{remaining_after_savings}-{mom_gave}={money_needed}>>{money_needed}
